title: Sailing on a Clear Day
description: A view from the side of a sailboat, showcasing the sails billowing in the wind. The boat is cutting through vibrant blue waters under a bright sky filled with fluffy white clouds. The horizon features a distant landmass, suggesting a serene and picturesque sailing experience.

title: Water Treatment Process Diagram
description: An illustrated diagram depicting a water treatment process. It shows various buildings and tanks connected by pipes. The top section includes a building, two circular tanks, and a larger treatment facility with multiple compartments. The bottom section features two houses and two large circular tanks, indicating the flow of water through the system.
